title: Price slipping mechanism
body:
If users try to mint an NFT while the price slips, particularly in the case of manually lowered gas fees or spikes in purchases, it causes a reverted TX.

Should we adjust the price in the frontend to use the next iteration's value, creating a 1-block buffer to reduce this from happening, or should we leave it as-is?
author: 0x3d3d3d7bBE26Cce6c143A8d72503B211BA80B753
